医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
家长保护孩子免受网络游戏风险的提示随着在线游戏成为儿童中越来越流行的消遣，家长们越来越担心孩子可能面临的潜在风险和危险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Tips-for-parents-to-safeguard-children-from-online-gaming-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Tips-for-parents-to-safeguard-children-from-online-gaming-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=838c219f-ac0c-4128-8871-014915689158 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 08:43:00 -0400 Tips for parents to safeguard children from online gaming risks
怀孕期间吸烟影响孩子的学业成绩吸烟几乎损害身体的每个部位。但如果你在怀孕时吸烟，烟草中的有毒化学物质也会伤害你未出生的婴儿，新的研究表明，这可能会导致学校学业成绩下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Smoking-during-pregnancy-affects-childrene28099s-academic-achievement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Smoking-during-pregnancy-affects-childrene28099s-academic-achievement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1fea98c-7fdf-49f4-bdba-ae7fc1d013c3 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 08:39:00 -0400 Smoking during pregnancy affects children’s academic achievement
新的指尖采血测试可能会彻底改变阿尔茨海默病的筛查全科医生很快就可以使用莫纳什大学工程师开发的简单手持设备来筛查患者的阿尔茨海默病（AD）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/New-finger-prick-blood-test-could-revolutionize-Alzheimere28099s-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/New-finger-prick-blood-test-could-revolutionize-Alzheimere28099s-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c61ffee0-d15c-487d-bc71-8970b0d5446d Fri, 30 Aug 2024 08:35:00 -0400 New finger-prick blood test could revolutionize Alzheimer’s screening
Ingenza 宣布与 Cellugy 合作研究生物制造纤维素的潜力工业生物技术专家 Ingenza 很高兴地宣布，它正在与 Cellugy 合作，加速其用于生产生物制造纤维素的创新平台的开发。该技术将为各种工业应用（从个人护理开始）提供化石石化产品的可持续替代品。新项目最终将加速对细菌纤维素生产的理解和优化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Ingenza-announces-partnership-with-Cellugy-to-investigate-the-pottial-of-biofabricated-纤维素.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Ingenza-announces-partnership-with-Cellugy-to-investigate-the-potial-of-biofabricated-纤维素.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83e2ffb9-a98e-4347-9931-efec654df1cb Fri, 30 Aug 2024 07:19:00 -0400 Ingenza announces partnership with Cellugy to investigate the potential of biofabricated cellulose
重新定义 5hmC：不仅仅是 DNA 去甲基化途径的垫脚石一个重要的 DNA 修饰是甲基化，即在胞嘧啶的第 5 个碳上添加甲基。它形成 5-甲基胞嘧啶 (5mC)，通常与基因表达的抑制相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Redefining-5hmC-More-than-just-a-stepping-stone-in-the-DNA-demethylation-pathway.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Redefining-5hmC-More-than-just-a-stepping-stone-in-the-DNA-demethylation-pathway.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e12ccf3-7717-4fea-8d80-aeb8242a4c07 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 07:15:00 -0400 Redefining 5hmC: More than just a stepping stone in the DNA demethylation pathway
Micropore 任命 Insung Chroma-Tech Co 为韩国经销商Micropore Technologies 刚刚宣布任命 Insung Chroma-Tech Co. 作为其专利膜技术在韩国市场的经销商https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Micropore-appoints-Insung-Chroma-Tech-Co-as-korean-distributor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Micropore-appoints-Insung-Chroma-Tech-Co-as-korean-distributor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8c7528a-365c-440d-a5db-6060f8e815ce Fri, 30 Aug 2024 07:08:00 -0400
微孔任命新首席执行官凯在公司的一个重要转折点加入该公司。 Micropore 正在从早期概念验证转变为完全开发的药物输送解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Micropore-appoints-new-CEO.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Micropore-appoints-new-CEO.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4540377-c68e-490a-b78b-b0042cf35725 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 07:07:00 -0400 Micropore appoints new CEO
伊沙尼·马尔霍特拉 (Ishani Malhotra) 被癌症研究视野评为“年度女企业家”英国癌症研究中心的创新部门癌症研究地平线 (Cancer Research Horizo​​ns) 于 3 月 20 日在伦敦举行的晚宴上宣布了第二届创新与创业奖的获奖者名单。这些奖项旨在表彰英国在肿瘤学领域最具创新性和进取性的努力，重点表彰那些在肿瘤学领域做出的杰出贡献的个人。该行业正在努力将发现转化为癌症患者的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Ishani-Malhotra-named-e28098woman-entrepreneur-of-the-yeare28099-by-cancer-research-horizo​​ns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Ishani-Malhotra-named-e28098woman-entrepreneur-of-the-yeare28099-by-cancer-research-horizo​​ns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5dd6ece7-c0b2-45af-8b52-7fb5861828ac Fri, 30 Aug 2024 06:55:00 -0400 Ishani Malhotra named ‘woman entrepreneur of the year’ by cancer research horizons
Carcinotech 发表了关于患者来源的 3D 打印肿瘤的研究，作为药物开发的突破性工具组织工程和 3D 生物打印的进步彻底改变了生理相关 3D 体外癌症模型的开发，提供了更接近的肿瘤微环境 (TME) 表征并实现了高通量药物筛选。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Carcinotech-publishes-research-on-病人-衍生-3D-printed-tumors-as-a-breakthrough-tool-for-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Carcinotech-publishes-research-on-病人-衍生-3D-printed-tumors-as-a-breakthrough-tool-for-drug-development.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92684502-94af-4467-972e-47b674a68766 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 05:02:00 -0400 Carcinotech publishes research on patient-derived 3D-printed tumors as a breakthrough tool for drug development
第一代抗组胺药可能会增加幼儿癫痫发作的风险研究表明，第一代抗组胺药可能会增加幼儿癫痫发作的风险，这凸显了谨慎处方的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/First- Generation-antihistamine-drugs-could-increase-seizure-risk-among-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/First- Generation-antihistamine-drugs-could-increase-seizure-risk-among-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67d7f863-19d5-4d33-91fd-5e2fcc0e2ccb Fri, 30 Aug 2024 05:00:00 -0400 First-generation antihistamine drugs could increase seizure risk among young children
